data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article An, Jeong-Seop, Choi, Sei-Woong, Ronkay, László (2013): New Noctuidae (s. l.) species from the Korean fauna with description of a new species of Bryophila Treitschke, 1825 (Lepidoptera: Erebidae and Noctuidae). Zootaxa 3734 (3): 345-361, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3734.3.4
